tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE architectural_projects (
    project_id STRING PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name STRING NOT NULL,
    project_architect STRING,
    project_year INT,
    project_description STRING
)

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    architect_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    project_year INT,
    project_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE designs (
    design_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    design_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    designer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    design_description TEXT,
    design_year INT,
    design_style VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE architectural_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    architect_name VARCHAR(255),
    completion_year INT,
    project_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE architectural_designs (
    design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    design_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    design_description TEXT,
    designer_name VARCHAR(255),
    year_created INT,
    design_style VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE project_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    image_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    image_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES architectural_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    architect_name VARCHAR(255),
    completion_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE Designs (
    design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    design_name VARCHAR(255),
    design_description TEXT,
    design_image_url VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ArchitecturalProjects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    architect_name VARCHAR(255),
    completion_year INT,
    project_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectImages (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    image_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES ArchitecturalProjects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectComments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    commenter_name VARCHAR(255),
    comment_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES ArchitecturalProjects(project_id)
);
